conversations.body_text: Hi mike h,    You can use two control boxes: the Vam Pro uses the X Ultra control box, while the pedal uses the original control box.

I have done that and they seemed to work ok but now they have stopped working...not connected in Simsonn manager but recognised in simhub but not working?



Sent from my Galaxy



-------- Original message --------

Nothing is working now,the Vam pro motors are not recognised in the Simsonn manager software?



Sent from my Galaxy



-------- Original message --------

Hi mike h,    Two different types of controllers may not work together properly. The older Simsonn Pro pedal is typically compatible only with the PlusX controller and may not work with the ProX Ultra controller box.  If the ProX Ultra controller cannot detect the motor, please try manually updating the firmware. Additionally, we recommend using a USB 3.0 (blue) port and avoiding USB hubs when connecting the device.         Please follow the steps below to start the firmware update process:    Press the upgrade button on the controller box;    Reconnect the USB cable;    Wait for the software to indicate that it has entered “Simsonn Flasher Mode”;    Go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-proxultra.sfu to start updating the firmware;    After the update is completed, release the upgrade button;    Finally, test and recalibrate the pedals.

Hi again, I have ordered a plus x control box so I can use the pedals and Vam motors from one box.Can I please return the Ultra box?
        Regards,Mike



Sent from my Galaxy



-------- Original message --------

Hi mike h,  You can sell this Ultra controller box on the market. Since we provide the controller box mostly at shipping and cost price for customer upgrades, the return shipping cost could reach several tens of dollars, which exceeds the value of the controller box itself.

What if I can't get the ultra control box to work again,as it just stopped connection for no reason?



Sent from my Galaxy



-------- Original message --------

I have got the motors working again with the instructions you gave me, however when I plug my usb back into the pedal control box it says it's too old and then it's disconnected?



Sent from my Galaxy



-------- Original message --------

Should I try flashing the control box with 1.7.0 sfu?



Sent from my Galaxy



-------- Original message --------

Hi mike h,    First, please ensure you are using SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2. Also, connect only one SIMSONN control box at a time—do not connect multiple units simultaneously.    For Pro series control boxes: If the version is 1.7.1, you can update the firmware via: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals-firmware → pedals-plus.sfu (This method does not apply to 1.7.0 control boxes.)    For PlusX pedals: Only the plusx.sfu firmware can be used for updates.     If you are using the PlusX pedal, please refer to the recommendations below:    VAM Pro Interference Issue To prevent the VAM Pro motor from interfering with the brake signal, you can install nylon washers and nylon screws on the VAM Pro motor.    Vibration Not Stopping / Disconnection Caused by Poor Grounding If the pedal keeps vibrating or disconnects unexpectedly, it is usually due to poor grounding of the PC, often caused by not using a three-prong plug or an outlet without proper grounding. We recommend following the solutions mentioned in the posts:    Connect the PC case to the rig frame with a metal connection.    Connect the main control box to the pedal’s metal screws for proper grounding. These steps can effectively resolve issues such as continuous vibration, signal interference, and random disconnections.       https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding     https://www.reddit.com/r/simracing/comments/1n291hi/solution_for_simsonn_vam_pro_emi_issues/

I do have the version 1.7.0 control box and it did work the other day for a couple of hours...when I went back to it it told me it was disconnected in Simsonn manager?

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

Hi mike h,  Version V1.7.0 cannot be updated and is not compatible with SIMSONN Manager. You can use Freejoy to update and restore it.      https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hnHNudj0VhE6xr7ypu-KeEDuVrlVHVg9/view?usp=drive_link

Sent from my Galaxy



-------- Original message --------

And is it possible to update the control box to 1.7.1...if so where is the file for v 1.7.1?



Sent from my Galaxy



-------- Original message --------
Hi mike h,  Version 1.7.0 is an early release and does not include a bootloader. As a result, it cannot be upgraded to 1.7.1 and is not compatible with the SIMSONN Manager software.
Hi mike h,  May I ask which pedal you are using? This control box is only compatible with the ProX Ultra. For PlusX or other pedals, a separate PlusX control box is required.
